info.description:
WEB Service - Incident Management Technical Test - Production Environment

item.name: Authenticates a user with username and password, returning JWT and refresh token if successful.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Registers a new user and returns tokens and user info if registration is successful.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Issues a new access token using a valid refresh token.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Revokes a specific refresh token, making it unusable for future requests.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Logs out the current user by revoking all their refresh tokens.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Gets information about the currently authenticated user.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Validates if a refresh token is still valid and active.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Updates the profile information of the authenticated user.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Changes the password of the authenticated user.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Initiates the password reset process by sending a reset token to the user's email.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Resets the user's password using a valid reset token.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Validates password strength without storing it. Useful for real-time validation in frontend.
